content: सब्रह्मचारिन् {%<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A fellow-student, one going through the same studies and observing the same austerities. {@--2@} A fellow-sufferer, sympathiser; दुःखसब्रह्मचारिणी तरलिका क्व गता <ls>K.</ls>; हे व्यसनसब्रह्मचारिन् यदि न गुह्यं ततः श्रोतुमिच्छामि <ls>Mu. 6.</ls> {@--3@} (Hence) An equal, of the same kind; <ls>Vb. 1. 39.</ls>
